short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to visualize all the fields of a record (light and dark mode)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to visualize all the fields of a netsuite record (choose between light and dark mode) while you are logged in and also see the content of either body and line fields values. It gives you a smooth look in a JSON view and allows you to navigate easily to search your data, you can also switch to a XML raw view. Also, you can filter the JSON either by key and/or value.
